parameter.value: Ah, looking for some cooking utensils today, |PLAYERNAME|? Welcome!
Be greeted, |PLAYERNAME|! May I help you? With some {instruments}, perhaps?
You can buy a lyre, lute, drum, and simple fanfare. I also sell pianos and harps. If you'd like to see my offers, ask me for a {trade}.
I make instruments and sometimes I'm wandering through the lands of Tibia as a bard.
